titleStmt.title: The prayse of nothing. By E. D.
titleStmt.author: Dyer, Edward, Sir, 1543-1607, attributed name.
Daunce, Edward, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, beneath the conduite, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by H. Iackson,

notesStmt.note: Not by Dyer, probably by E. Daunce--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
